data.price: 5. Verily, along with every hardship is relief,
6. Verily, along with every hardship is relief (i.e. there is one hardship with two reliefs, so one hardship cannot overcome two reliefs).

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.
